en.title: Senior Mobile Developer
en.bio: Passionate mobile developer with expertise in Flutter, iOS, and Android. Building beautiful, performant apps that users love. Also experienced in backend development and product analytics.
en.skillsDesc: With years of experience in mobile development, I specialize in creating cross-platform applications with Flutter while maintaining deep expertise in native iOS and Android development.

tr.title: Kidemli Mobil Gelistirici
tr.bio: Flutter, iOS ve Android konularinda uzman tutkulu bir mobil gelistirici. Kullanicilarin sevdigi guzel ve performansli uygulamalar gelistiriyorum. Backend gelistirme ve urun analitigi konularinda da deneyimliyim.
tr.skillsDesc: Mobil gelistirme alanindaki yillarlik deneyimimle, Flutter ile platformlar arasi uygulamalar olusturmada uzmanlasmis olup, yerel iOS ve Android gelistirmede de derin uzmanligi koruyorum.

description.en: Brief description of your role and responsibilities.

tr: Kullanilan teknolojiler veya teslim edilen projeler
